Hello,

Working on some stuff for the site behind the scenes.

If you visit=
 http://shinsengumihq.com/shq/?page_id=3D83
click on the link "filmography"=
 and you'll see a very long list of Shinsengumi 
films (Imdb does not list =
all films featuring the Shinsengumi).

Now, we would love to post more expa=
nded reviews of films.  So if you've 
seen a film/anime featuring the guys =
please forward your review to: 
secretarytocapt3(at)hotmail.com .

We also =
have a list of films which already have reviews but they aren't live 
yet u=
ntil I reformat font/images.  So if you want to give your opinion on 
more =
mainstream films such as Gohatto or Mibugishiden just send me an 
email.

D=
ue to the fact that the Shinsengumi are featured in anything from rated-G 
=
anime for kids, high brow cinema to adult films it is all right to write 
c=
lever/cynical reviews because let's face it some of these films really 
des=
erve it. (^_^)

I'm currently figuring out an efficient way of putting thin=
gs back online 
because I've just determined that having Photoshop, WS/FTP,=
 Wordpress, 
Wordpress edit mode, html builder all open at the same time is=
 really 
slowing me down.

ttyl
